#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<utility>
#include<cassert>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<numeric>
#include<functional>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<list>
#include<sstream>
#include<cctype>
#include<cmath>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<iterator>
using namespace std;
  int main()
{
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++)
    {
        char a=s[i]+1;
        if(s[i]=='z')
        cout<<"a";
        else
        cout<<a;
    }
    cout<<endl;
    
    return 0;
}
